afraid; trembling
боюсь; дрожь

  • heart 忄 sitting high in a tree 栗: trembling with fear

Ideographic: A tree 木 bearing nuts 覀; compare 果

purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 忄 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
    • 栗 [ lì ] chestnut tree; chestnuts; surname
koohiiStory1: Shudder. If chestnut trees were sentient, shudder would be their state of mind as the tree shaker approaches. Note: Tree shakers are used commercially to harvest nuts and cider apples. A tree shaker makes a tree shudder causing all the ripe chestnuts to fall.
koohiiStory2: shudder: You’re in the state of mind of shuddering with fear when the chestnut tree is falling over towards you.
kunYomi: おそ.れる、 おのの.く、 ふる.える
Ru_trainchinese: lì: (графема) (книжн.) холодный, прохладный; трястись, дрожать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the heart of (忄) the chestnut (栗) is afraid
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " heart " and " chest " sound, the original meaning is fear and fear. "Poetry‧Qin Feng‧Yellow Bird": "Looking at its acupoint, worrying about its chestnut." Mao Chuan: "Li, fear also."

" Li " also means trembling and shaking. "Su Wen‧ Malaria Theory": "The beginning of malaria also starts from the vellus hair, stretches the owe, and then becomes a chilling chestnut drum." Wang Bing's note: "Li means shivering."

" Li " also expressed sadness. "Wen Xuan-Zhang Heng "Xi Jing Fu"": "I will leave without a half, mourn the chestnut and tremble." Xue Zong's note: "Li, worry about sorrow."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " heart " and " chest " sound, the original meaning is fear and fear.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「栗」聲，本義為畏懼、恐懼。《詩‧秦風‧黃鳥》：「臨其穴，惴惴其慄。」毛傳：「慄，懼也。」

　　「慄」也表示戰栗、顫抖。《素問‧瘧論》：「瘧之始發也，先起於毫毛，伸欠，乃作寒慄鼓頷。」王冰注：「慄，謂戰慄。」

　　「慄」還表示憂傷。《文選‧張衡〈西京賦〉》：「將乍往而未半，怵悼慄而慫兢。」薛綜注：「慄，憂戚也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「心」，「栗」聲，本義為畏懼、恐懼。

①落葉喬木，果實爲堅果，稱“栗子”，味甜，可食：栗色。火中取栗。
②發抖，因害怕或寒冷肢體顫動：戰慄。
③堅實：“縝密以慄”。
④姓氏。

Lesson: 41 frameNoV4: 3024 frameNoV6: 1736 Strokes: 13 Jouyou Grade: JH 
從「 心 」，「 栗 」聲，本義為畏懼、恐懼。《詩‧秦風‧黃鳥》：「臨其穴，惴惴其慄。」毛傳：「慄，懼也。」 「 慄 」也表示戰栗、顫抖。《素問‧瘧論》：「瘧之始發也，先起於毫毛，伸欠，乃作寒慄鼓頷。」王冰注：「慄，謂戰慄。」 「 慄 」還表示憂傷。《文選‧張衡〈西京賦〉》：「將乍往而未半，怵悼慄而慫兢。」薛綜注：「慄，憂戚也。」
From the " heart" and " chest" sound, the original meaning is fear and fear. "Poetry‧Qin Feng‧Yellow Bird": "Looking at its acupoint, worrying about its chestnut." Mao Chuan: "Li, fear also." " Li" also means trembling and shaking. "Su Wen‧ Malaria Theory": "The beginning of malaria also starts from the vellus hair, stretches the owe, and then becomes a chilling chestnut drum." Wang Bing's note: "Li means shivering." " Li" also expressed sadness. "Wen Xuan-Zhang Heng "Xi Jing Fu"": "I will leave without a half, mourn the chestnut and tremble." Xue Zong's note: "Li, worry about sorrow."

慄字的基本解释

慄
lì
同“栗”②。

慄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》力質切，入質，來。］
(1)恐惧。
(2)战栗。
(3)忧伤。
(4)谨敬。

慄字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慄； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页397第20
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力質切，音栗。【爾雅·釋詁】懼也。【增韻】竦縮也。【書·大禹謨】夔夔齊慄。【太公·金匱】禹居人上，慄慄如不滿日。　又憭慄，懰慄，悽愴貌。【楚辭·九辯】憭慄兮若在遠行，登山臨水送將歸。【漢武帝·李夫人賦】懰慄不言。通作栗。　又叶力結切，音烈。【古詩】孟冬寒氣至，北風何慘慄。愁多知夜長，仰觀衆星列。

慄字的源字形
